name: LuckSmith
description:
Forge Your Fate in this 2D turn-based roguelike game!

Upgrade your dice to fight foes and gain materials to upgrade even more!

Made using Scratch (yes that Scratch) and packaged with Turbowarp.

Fonts Used:

Awe Mono Gold (https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold-ii)

Inkbit Original (https://bsl.itch.io/inkbit)
